entry.title: Sunday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle or rain this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
